an10.188:4.1: “I will teach you the principle that results in suffering and that which results in happiness. …
an10.188:4.3: And what principle results in suffering?
an10.188:4.6: This is called the principle that results in suffering.
an10.188:5.1: And what principle results in happiness?
an10.188:5.4: This is called the principle that results in happiness.”
